main event: On November 18, 1957, a witness observed 1 to 3 white objects falling from the sky in Anderson, Indiana.
interesting points: The objects were described as growing in size as they approached the ground,The objects were very bright and cast-like in appearance,The sighting lasted for approximately 15 minutes,The objects moved in a straight line,The observer noted watching the objects while trying to check their motions and behavior.
sighted object: white cast-like objects falling from the sky
witness description: The witness was a 27-year-old male with some educational training.
